descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Torrey Craig drops off a nice bounce pass to Domantas Sabonis inside for the bucket.
videos.headline: Craig feeds Sabonis inside

videos.description: Amir Coffey gets the 3-pointer to fall as well as the and-1 for the Clippers.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Amir Coffey hits the 3-pointer and gets the and-1) 2022/01/17 ESHEET

videos.headline: Amir Coffey hits the 3-pointer and gets the and-1

videos.description: Oshae Brisett gets the feed from Justin Holliday and throws down the slam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Oshae Brissett goes soaring for dunk) 2022/01/17 ESHEET

videos.headline: Oshae Brissett goes soaring for dunk

videos.description: Eric Bledsoe gets it to Isaiah Hartenstein for the alley-oop as the Clippers lead by 7.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Bledsoe finds Hartenstein for the alley-oop) 2022/01/17 ESHEET

videos.headline: Bledsoe finds Hartenstein for the alley-oop

videos.description: Amir Coffey dimes Nicolas Batum who drills the 3-pointer to extend the Clippers' lead.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Amir Coffey shows off his vision with nice dime vs. Indiana Pacers) 2022/01/17 ESHEET

videos.headline: Amir Coffey rifles a dart to Nicolas Batum for a Clippers 3

videos.description: Isaiah Hartenstein lobs a beauty to Terance Mann who finishes with the two-handed jam for the alley-oop.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Check out this sweet pass from Isaiah Hartenstein) 2022/01/17 ESHEET

videos.headline: Terance Mann elevates to throw down the massive alley-oop

videos.description: Reggie Jackson takes it coast-to-coast and rocks the rim to extend the Clippers' lead.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Reggie Jackson throws down powerful slam dunk vs. Indiana Pacers) 2022/01/17 ESHEET

videos.headline: Reggie Jackson soars through the paint and unloads a thunderous jam

videos.description: Reggie Jackson gets open and dunks it home to put the game away as the Clippers come away with the victory 133-139.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Reggie Jackson elevates for dunk vs. Indiana Pacers) 2022/01/17 ESHEET

videos.headline: Reggie Jackson throws down the dunk to seal the victory for the Clippers
